version_description: Adding 2 exciting video styles for your slideshows.  Check them out today!

Now add video! You can now add your videos, photos and Live Photos to your MoShows. We are also adding even more new styles, including the Chinese New Year - Year of the Pig.
Now you can add your own music to your MoShow videos! Adding 4 fun new video Styles - over 55 now available. Fixed sharing to WeChat and other performance improvements.
This update includes various bug fixes and performance improvements. Enjoy!
我们为假日添加了新的风格。 使用 "Christmas" 或 "Snowfall" 感受传统风格，为你最棒的照片创建一个倒数计时吧 , 或尝试我们最受欢迎的新风格: "Shimmer"。 尽情享受吧!
We are adding new Valentines and Chinese New Year styles! Enjoy!
Now you can add your own music to your MoShow videos! Adding 4 fun new video Styles - over 55 now available. Fixed sharing to WeChat and other performance improvements.
Adding 5 fun new Styles to celebrate Spring! Over 60 video Styles now available.
Adding 4 exciting video styles for your slideshows. Check them out today!
65 video Styles available! This recurring update includes various fixes and improvements. Enjoy!

MoShow now supports Live Photos! Use Live Photos to make stunning slideshows that come alive! We also added 4 new video styles that work great with any content.
Adding 4 fresh styles to show off your pictures and Live Photos in a MoShow slideshow!
Adding 4 exciting video styles for your slideshows.  Check them out today!
Adding support for different video sizes. You can now use MoShow to make eye-catching Instagram Stories or widescreen videos!
Adding support for different screen sizes. You can now use MoShow to make eye-catching Instagram Stories or widescreen videos! Improving support for iOS 12 and new iPhones.
Adding video styles for the holidays! Also adding the ability to display content longer and adjust the speed of your slideshows.
